About BaxterBaxter provides a broad portfolio of essential renal and hospital products, including home, acute and in-centre dialysis; sterile IV solutions; infusion systems and devices; parenteral nutrition; surgery products and anaesthetics; and pharmacy automation, software and services. The company’s global footprint and the critical nature of its products and services play a key role in expanding access to healthcare in emerging and developed countries. Baxter’s employees worldwide are building upon the company’s rich heritage of medical breakthroughs to advance the next generation of healthcare innovations that enable patient care.What You’ll Be DoingTo perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duties as below:Lead project assignments and engineer team to achieve timeline and efficiency of outcomeFind efficacy of methods through constructing detail and planning schedulesIdentify and evaluate new technological tools & devices Develop validation strategies and identify specs of new machinesApply technical knowledge to plan ad capable processes Implement continuous improvement of existing processes to increase productivity, quality, and cost effective.Work closely with users to ensure life cycle and effectiveness of machines installedDo you have what ittakes to build a career here?Bachelor degree in EngineeringMinimum of 5 years of experiences in leading maintenance project would be highly preferredKnowledge of Six Sigma concepts Ability to interact with all cross-functions and levels as well as ability to prioritize tasksMust have background in manufacturing environmentWhy Baxter (Who we are)A Career That MattersBaxter’s employees are united in a mission to save and sustain lives. We are passionate about applying scientific innovation to meet the needs of the millions of people worldwide who depend on our medically necessary therapies and technologies. We focus on increasing access to healthcare, innovating in crucial areas of unmet need, and pursuing creative collaborations that bring our mission to life for patients every day.Apply today and experience a career that matters!Baxter is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, or any other status protected by law.7/398 Moo 6, T.Mapyangporn, A.Pluakdaeng, Rayong 21140 Thailand

An exciting Lead Engineer (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at heavy machinery business based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for Lead Engineer who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the Lead Engineer Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective engineering. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:Leading projects, work planning, directing and overseeing designers and engineers assigned to your projects, design reviews (both internal and with client), and checking deliverableDevelop study reports, proposals, scopes of work, schedules, material lists, design concepts, scope change documents, and corporate guidelineManage scope, schedule, and budgetManage the engineering and design process from inception to completionVisit customer sites for field workAssist in commissioning and start upReport to Expat General ManagerDevelop and implement specific plant policies/ procedures as required To succeed in the Lead Engineer job, you will need to have experiences on heavy machine industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher in Mechanical or Civil Engineering or related field in heavy machine, construction manufacturing10 years of heavy industrial experience in a design or project engineering role. Solid background in heavy machine businessProject management experienceStrong knowledge of mechanical engineering principles with an emphasis on mechanics, heavy lifting and transport businessMust have strong people management, leader skill and presentation skillGood command in English language This heavy machine company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined Lead Engineer with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity.Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

job_responsibilities: ['We are looking for a person with good negotiation and contracting skills to manage the relationships on a corporate level with some of the most important Transportation environment based in Thailand.Responsibilities:Ensure the organizational principles of integrity and compliance. Draft, evaluate, negotiate and execute contracts. job_description: We are looking for a person with good negotiation and contracting skills to manage the relationships on a corporate level with some of the most important Transportation environment based in Thailand.Responsibilities:Ensure the organizational principles of integrity and compliance. Draft, evaluate, negotiate and execute contracts. Establish and maintain supplier relationships by serving as a single point of contact for contractual matters.Interface with insurance companies regarding adequacy of coverage and purchasing needs.Manage record keeping for all contract-related correspondence and documentation.Provide contract-related issue resolution, both internally and externally. Monitor and complete contract close-out, variation, extension or renewal, as appropriate.Personally manage supplier relationships and have face to face negotiations for Key Products and Preferential Partner Agreements, which may include Exclusive Conditions, Deposits and Risk Contracts.Achieve the necessary terms and conditions needed on each contract to succeed in the market place, with a focus on Pricing and Availability.Represent the interests of the company on Face to Face Negotiations, Work-shops, Seminars, Travel Trade shows and Site Inspections.Qualification:Bachelor or Master Degree in Engineering or Business Management, preferably in Transportation Management filed.Strong negotiation skills, analytical, strategic & creative problem solving skills.Ability to work independently as well as within a team. Able to managing multiple projects & tight deadlines. Good image & excellent communication & interpersonal skills face to face, over email or phone.Excellent English both written and oral essential. At least 5 years’ experience in management level or project work. Strong customer services skills. Hands-on, Professional, self-motivated. Good leadership skills.

job_title: Assistant Vice President Mechanical and Electrical Engineer– Real Estate or Retail (150-220K)
job_description: Position: Assistant Vice President Mechanical and Electrical Engineer– Real Estate (150-220K)Location: BangkokContact Recruiter: Une +6689-922-1673 / sununtinee (at) mriww.co.thSend your resume “NOW” before someone else gets the job!!!Our Client is an international real estate company. They are looking for Building Manager for a mega project.Responsibilities:Continually review the contractor’s construction schedule during the progress of the site works with regards to MEP services and report to the Project Director on the same. Manage costs and forecast costs to completeManage communities and public and authorities to ensure construction goes smoothAdvice on all issues regarding LEED and ensure that the appropriate documentation and information is provided to the appropriate authorities to obtain the LEED standard required on the project. Provide inputs and reports on a regular basisCoordinate with intra departments for smooth project executionManage the day to day work of the MEP team, including review coordination documents and feedback.Review and manage buildability issuesCoordination meeting with manage design information other related consultants, such as: MEP consultant, interior designer, architect, and operator during construction stage Assist in tender process for scope of works, drawing reviews, programming and planningRequirements:Thai Nationality OnlyBachelor Degree in Mechanical Engineering,Civil or Structure Engineering35-45 years oldMinimum 10 years’ Experience in the real estate industry operating as management role in a shopping center or commercial buildingsSenior level experience in construction and facility managementGood with numbers and financial planningInternational Project management experience is a plusStrong in Engineering Standards. Standard Operation Procedure (SOP) with experience in various Engineering. LEED, Thai Green Building-TREES-A is a plusStrong knowledge of local codes and standards.Strong analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent English skillsAttractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates.Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refer the position asAssistant Vice President Mechanical and Electrical – Real EstateTo sununtinee(at)mriww.co.thIf you believe that you are the right one,Call Sununtinee"NOW"+6689-922-1673

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesTo lead and coordinate engineering activities on assigned projects and delivery of engineering documentation in compliance with the constraints of cost, time and technical quality as defined in the Project Execution Plan and Client expectation.Study project proposal, contract, client project specification and any other key documents and arrange for proper transfer of information to the Project. Understand the scope of the supply, the interfaces with other work and interfaces with other departments.Contribute to Project Manager to develop project engineering procedure for the project.Co-ordinate with engineering support team to set up and ensure all Company’s engineering tools are sufficient for the projectContribute to Project to conduct a project kick‑off meeting prior to starting the major production Engineering. Ensure proper understanding of the project requirements and to warrant a proper start of that project phase.Co-ordinate engineering disciplines and ensure proper and effective communication, alignment and co-ordination among engineering disciplines ensuring they function as a unified team. Ensure that deliverables to these internal customers are provided in a timely fashion and presented in the format specified by the project procedures.Cooperate with the Project Management team, Lead Discipline Engineers and Engineering Discipline Department Managers (where so specified in the PEP)in the provision of these design reviews and conduct design reviews meeting with respect to issues of safety, constructability, operability and maintenance. Ensure that the requirements of the Client as defined in the Contract, continue to be met.Record and ensure comments from design review meetings has been distributed to all Lead Engineers and understand.Ensure comments during design review meeting has been incorporated and agreed with Client.Contribute to Project to develop design review closeout reports.Monitor engineering resource requirements with Lead Engineer including review of specialised resource requirements based upon project scope and schedule. Co-ordinate with Lead Engineers to engineering status reports (Weekly and Monthly).Conduct engineering status review, both internally and externally (with client) and ensure that established actions are carried out within the associated deadlines. Continually seek to improve the performance of the team looking to improve profitability of the project to the company.Ensure that the team files information in accordance with the project filing structure, and that filed data is properly identified to allow document evolution to be fully traceable. Contribute to Project Manager to maintain a proper record on scope changes.Coordination with Construction team and engineering for site queries during construction phase.Coordination with Construction team and engineering for as-built activities.Ensure final document delivered to client are good quantity and meet client requirement and contract.Contribute to the project Lessons Learned report.Contribute statistics and other project information to the project close out report.Provide on the job training to Junior engineering staff.Other assignment upon project requirement and this role shall indicate clearly in PEP.']
job_qualifications: ['s & CompetenciesA Bachelor of Engineering, or equivalent degree, recognised by Engineers Certification in a relevant discipline.Minimum 2 years of experience for Project Engineer position in Lead Discipline Engineer or multi-discipline management in related field.Minimum 4 years of experience for Senior Project Engineer position in Lead discipline Engineer or multi-discipline management in related field.Have worked as an Engineer, senior Engineer or lead level in an industry relevant to the project which s/he will lead.Good knowledge of the company’s engineering tools (design integrated systems) and be able to create deliverables with these tools.Good knowledge of company’s corporate procedures.Has an ethic of responsibility and ownership, stewarding issues to conclusion.Has a personality of flexible, positive attitude and positive thinking.Good Knowledge of project Engineering management work flow.Sound judgement in recognising and resolving issues to minimise adverse impacts.Respected within the team as a person of integrity and competence.Able to work with others in such a way that a unified team is created.Able to offer direction and technical assistance to anyone in the team.Able to identify and manage a variety of personalities so that each person in the team is given the necessary attention and support required.Able to identify and manage a variety of problem occur during project execution and given the necessary attention and support required.Able to conduct constructive meeting and effective result. ']

job_responsibilities: ['Bangkok Bank is transforming its Transaction Banking business to adapt to the competitive, regulatory and technical challenges that will shape the future of banking.To help drive this transformation, the Transaction Banking Transformation PMO Lead is required to shape and implement an effective Program Office.This is a highly strategic role, requiring engagement and influence at all levels of the organization.The role presents an opportunity to join a fast paced, highly visible group of individuals passionate about changing the way Transaction Banking is delivered.Role & Responsibilities:Develop, lead and motivate their team as well as the broader transformation program team membersDevelop and implement strong program governance processesManage communication plans and stakeholders briefingsIdentify and managekey program issues, risks, status changes, cross functional impactsRequired Skills:Must have experience in Project Management and executionStrong analysis skills and the ability to think and plan strategicallyAttention to detail and diligent in follow throughAbility to influence othersExcellent communication, interpersonal and presentation skills']

job_title: วิศวกรโครงการ/วิศวกรอาวุโส ( กทม.โซนเหนือ) "ด่วน"
job_description: คุณสมบัติวุฒิการการศึกษา ป.ตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมโยธา หรือ ก่อสร้างมีประสบการณ์การด้านงานก่อสร้างมีประสบการณ์ควบคุมงานบ้านแนวราบความรับผิดชอบบริหารงานก่อสร้างบ้านแนวราบ P/C - T/Fการสมัครงานรบกวนติดต่อ คุณอ๊อต (081-8709111) คุณแต๋ม (087-970-3854) หรือ แผนกสรรหาบุคคล 02-732-1041-5 ต่อ 207

หน้าที่งาน:ควบคุมงานติดตั้ง และบริหารงาน ประเมินราคา สรุปการประชุมแต่ละโครงการออกแบบงานตกแต่งภายในสามารถควบคุมงานและดูงานต่างจังหวัดได้ประสานงานภายใน เช่น ส่วนงานวิศวกร ส่วนงานขาย และส่วนงานอื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องประสานงานภายนอก เช่น ลูกค้า, คู่ค้า, Suppliers เพื่อให้โครงการดำเนินไปได้อย่างราบรื่นและทันกำหนดเวลาควบคุมงบประมาณ คุณภาพของโครงการให้ได้ตามแผนที่วางไว้และเป็นไปตามนโยบายของบริษัทสร้างความพึงพอใจให้กับทุกส่วนที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการคุณสมบัติ:วุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิศวโยธามีประสบการณ์ทำงานด้านการบริหารโครงการไม่ต่ำกว่า 5 ปีทำงานเขียนแบบ AutoCAD สามารถเขียนแบบและออกแบบงานได้หากเขียนและออกแบบงานตกแต่งภายในได้ (จะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ)ฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษได้ดีมีความสามารถในการเจรจาต่อรอง เพื่อความสำเร็จของโครงการมีความรับผิดชอบ สามารถทำงานเป็นทีม และทนรับแรงกดดันได้เป็นอย่างดีมีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี และสามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้เป็นอย่างดีสวัสดิการ:ตามกฏหมายประกันอุบัติเหตุค่าน้ำมันรถ/ เดินทาง (ขึ้นกับตำแหน่งลักษณะงาน)อบรมต่างประเทศประกันสังคมกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพโบนัสบริษัท พรีเมียร์ บิสสิเนส อินเตอร์ จำกัด (ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล)888/111,116,117 อาคารมหาทุนพลาซ่า ชั้น 11 ถนนเพลินจิต แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพฯ 10330โทรศัพท์ :02-6508681 ต่อ 801-802www.pbi.co.th

job_title: วิศวกรพัฒนาโครงการ (Project Development Engineer) 1 ตำแหน่ง
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน;จัดทำแผนพัฒนาการลงทุนโครงการใหม่ ๆรวบรวมข้อมูล วิเคราะห์โอกาสความเป็นไปได้ในการพัฒนาโครงการใหม่ ๆ และนำเสนอผู้บังคับบัญชาเพื่อพิจารณาจัดทำรายละเอียดสัญญาและประสานงานการขอใบอนุญาตจากหน่วยงานภาครัฐ และเอกชนต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องในการพัฒนาโครงการตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายงานอื่น ๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายSalary: ตามโครงสร้างคุณสมบัติ:เพศ : ชาย – หญิงการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ เศรษฐศาสตร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องมีความรู้และประสบกาณ์ด้านการวิเคราะห์โครงการและพัฒนาโครงการใหม่ ๆ อย่างน้อย 1-3 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความรู้ ความสามารถในการวิเคราะห์โอกาสความเป็นไปได้ทางธุรกิจ (Feasibility Analysis) จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีความสนใจในการทำงานด้านบริหารธุรกิจมีความกระตือรือร้น และสามารถทำงานภายใต้ภาวะความกดดันได้มีทัศนคติการทำงานที่ดี มีบุคลิกดีน่าเชื่อถือ ทำงานแบบมืออาชีพ สามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้สามารถขับรถได้และมีใบอนุญาตขับขี่ และเดินทางปฏิบัติงานต่างจังหวัดได้ทุกพื้นที่มีบุคคลิกดีน่าเชื่อถือ และมีความรับผิดชอบHow to apply a jobQualified candidates can fill the job application at the company every day on Monday to Saturday at 08.00-15.00 or submit your resume to Khun Juntra or Khun Wassana, Human Resources Department at Sahacogen (Chonburi) Pubilc Company Limited; 636 Moo 11, Sriracha Saha Group Industrial Park, Sukaphiban 8 Road, Nongkharm, Sriracha, Chonburi, 20230. Telephone number: 038-481-555 ext. 242-243, or fill the job application on the company’s website at www.sahacogen.com, or send the job application attached with your resume to Apply Now (please indicate the required position in the subject).Human Resources DepartmentSahacogen(Chonburi)Public Co.,LtdM.11, Sukaphiban 8 Road, Nongkharm,Sriracha, Chonburi 20130Tel:0 3848 1555 Fax :0 3848 1551http://www.sahacogen.com or send a CV by click “ Apply Now ”

JOB CONTEXTThe Continuous Improvement Manager is responsible for the development and delivery of the Manufacturing Operating System (Manufacturing Operating System - MOS) within the plant. This program is an enabler to deliver the plant Compelling Business Need (CBN). The role drives the manufacturing excellence culture (improve and lock), building on the principals of zero loss, zero defects and a 100% engagement within the plant.GOAL AND KEY ACCOUNTABILITIESThe Continuous Improvement Manager delivers the key plant results (Compelling Business Need - CBN), such as zero safety accidents, zero quality (losses), cost savings, efficiency improvement, 100% Customer Service Level and 100% engagement using the Manufacturing Operating System - MOS program as an enabler. The role is responsible for developing and delivering the Manufacturing Operating System - MOS roadmap for the plant, building on the standard Manufacturing Operating System - MOS program. High personal development of some Leadership CapabilitiesRESPONSIBILITIES/KEY ACTIVITIESLeadership:Leads and role models output of Manufacturing Operating System - MOS supporting roll out and further development with hands approach by leading the Fundamental PillarDelivers excellent results within the area through engaged leadership and coaching. Drives a culture of engagement and develops capabilitiesWorks closely with the Global Pillar to ensure Manufacturing Operating System development and implementation in a standard wayWorks effectively with the Management Team of the plant as linking pin ensuring the implementation of the Manufacturing Operating System - MOS programLeads a specific loss reduction project (role modeling in Continuous Improvement execution)Drives proactive benchmarking with other internal and external Continuous Improvement managers to generate best practiceStrong focus on people development, training, coaching and consistently improve Continuous Improvement capabilities and engagement in the plant with hands-on mentality Delivery & Cost:Has a clear understanding and accountability of costs and performance criteria delivering the Annual Operations Plan – AOP to ultimately deliver the Value Creation Plan - VCPDevelops Manufacturing Operating System - MOS implementation plan to deliver the plant Compelling Business Need (CBN), with clear focus on zero defects, zero losses and a total engagement culture. This plan needs to be consistent with standard JDE Manufacturing Operating System - MOS roadmapImplements the standard Manufacturing Operating System - MOS Continuous Improvement program, pillar structure and related capabilitiesOwns daily Operations Performance meetings Structure (OPS), basic problem solving tools (Root Cause Analysis, Kaizen, Single Minute Exchange of Dies - SMED, 6Sigma) and 5SActively monitors and follows-up on the key performance indicators of the areaSupports cost reduction and efficiency improvement initiativesUpdates relevant information, tracking and reporting systemsREQUIRED EXPERIENCE & COMPETENCIESEducationBachelor or Master Degree in Engineering (or related field)6Sigma (black belt)ExperienceMin 10 years experience in manufacturing environment preferred Fast Moving Consumer GoodsProfound knowledge of Total Productive Maintenance - TPM (prerequisite), Lean and 6Sigma methodologiesExperience in an international and multi-cultural environmentCross-functional exposure and collaborationChange management experienceProject management experience (leading project)CompetencyLeadership Capabilities Driving A Growth MindsetDelivering Above & Beyond Develops Self & OthersBuilds Winning PartnershipsCreates Clarity & DisciplineInspires a Culture of Pride & Performance

job_title: ผู้จัดการแผนกความปลอดภัยในการทำงาน
job_description: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบตรวจสอบ,แนะนำให้พนักงาน,ผู้รับเหมาต่างๆปฏิบัติตามกฎหมายความปลอดภัยอบรมพนักงานใหม่,ผู้รับเหมาที่เข้ามาใหม่ เกี่ยวกับกฎความปลอดภัยในการทำงานวิเคราะห์อันตรายและหามาตรการป้องกันหรือขั้นตอนการทำงานอย่างปลอดภัยต่อพนักงานประเมินความเสี่ยงด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานกำกับแนะนำพนักงาน,ผู้รับเหมาให้ปฏิบัติตามข้อบังคับและคู่มือความปลอดภัยในการทำงานแนะนำ,ฝึกสอน,อบรมพนักงานเพื่อให้ปฏิบัติงานด้วยความปลอดภัยสอบสวนและรวบรวมการประสบอันตรายในการทำงานของพนักงานทั้งของบริษัทและผู้รับเหมาและหาแนวทางป้องกันตรวจสอบ ทดสอบ เครื่องมือ อุปกรณ์ ที่ผู้รับเหมานำมาใช้ในการปฏิบัติงาน เช่น อุปกรณ์ดับเพลิง , เครื่องมือ เครื่องจักรที่ใช้ไฟฟ้า , เครน เป็นต้นตรวจสอบ . เสนอแนะ , แก้ไข ให้พื้นที่ปฏิบัติงานมีความปลอดภัยจัดให้มีการประชุม รายงานด้านความปลอดภัยเป็นประจำปฏิบัติงานด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานอื่นตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติอายุ28 ปีขึ้นไป สามารถขับรถยนต์ได้ มีใบขับขี่วุฒิปริญญาตรีสาขาอาชีวอนามัยและความปลอดภัย หรือผ่านการฝึกอบรม หลักสูตรเจ้าหน้าที่ความปลอดภัยในการทำงานระดับวิชาชีพ(จป.วิชาชีพ)ประจำศูนย์กระจายสินค้า จ.ฉะเชิงเทราทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันและสามารถวิเคราะห์และแก้ไขปัญหาได้ดีมีภาวะผู้นำ มนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี และมีทักษะในการสื่อสารเป็นอย่างดีมีทักษะในการเจรจา ติดต่อประสานงานกับหน่วยงานทั้งในและนอกองค์กรดีInterested candidates are invited to visit in person or write in with your transcript,CV, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below or click"Apply Now".Human Resource DepartmentC.J. Express Group Co., Ltd.393 Silom Road,Silom, Bangrak,Bangkok  10500Tel : 02-2235-3146-9www.cjexpress.co.th

POSITION PURPOSE ;Responsible for ensuring that business upholds environment standard and taking steps towards for greener future, controlling of the development, implementation, promotion and monitoring of environmental strategies, working with local authorities, government bodies, suppliers and customers to achieve business goals.JOB RESPONSIBILITIES;30% SUSTAINABILITY STRATEGY, PRACTICES & MANAGEMENTAnalyst the current practices of an organization and identifies points where environmental sustainability could be improved.Identify key performance indicators (KPIs) to establish how the business will know whether important sustainability targets have been met.Measure the performance of the business’s current sustainability practices to have a benchmark from which to improve.Work with customer, local authorities, government bodies, suppliers, customers etc. to ensure that we meet at least minimum recruitment.Plan and develop a strategy to improve environmental sustainability within a business.Communicate this strategy to colleagues, customers, stakeholders and vendors to help them understand undoubtedly.Participate in build project and add input of sustainability information for project team.30% ENERGY AND RESOURCES STRATEGY EXECUTION & MANAGEMENTContribute to the development and execution of Corporate resource andenergy efficiency strategy.Assess energy and resource efficiency risks and opportunities across a Business.Lead the identification and establishment of management systems to maintain and continuously improve energy and resource efficiency performance across a Business.Ensure organization measurements are tracked in accordance with standards.Provide the technical, behavioral and tactical expertise and consultation that leaders require to build performance in the areas of resource and energy efficiency.Partner with experts at a Business level to ensure understanding of regulations related to potential technology solutions.20% ENVIRONMENT AND RESOURCES STRATEGY EXECUTION & MANAGEMENTWorks with other department to ensure that we are complied with Cargill requirements, laws and regulations.Identifies and seeks technologies to reduce waste or generate value from waste.20% PEOPLE MANAGEMENTProvides the training of Energy conservation and Sustainability related, etc. to team.Supports team & business by strong drive & determination energy opportunity to minimize cost.QUALIFICATIONS;Bachelor’s degree in business, environmental sciences, environmental management, engineering or sustainability.At least 10 years of working experience in a similar role.Analytical and Computer skill (Microsoft office).Good English skills (Reading,Listening and Writhing).Strong personality, high responsibility , withstand with pressure group.Organizational and communication skills.Have high interaction and experience with project partners, government institutions and internal Cargill functions.Strategic thinking and stakeholder management.Adept in Standards interpretation, and with high knowledge in Quality Management Systems.Hold ISO 14001 Environmental Management standard certification.Energy management skill.

job_description: Responsibilities Controlling and maintaining the calibration system within the organization, including the preparation of concerned documents and procedures.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to review the impact of non-conforming products which are caused by machines, equipment or instruments.Coordinating with the QC Supervisor to monitor, review and analyze data from processes and products in order to improve said processes and products.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage internal and external audits within the organization.Coordinating with the QA Supervisor to manage and summarize the organization’s customer complaints and non-conformities, as well as to follow up on CAPA and/or any improvements.QualificationsBachelor's Degree in Physics, Materials Science or a related Science or Engineering degree.3+ years in metrology and calibration, QC or QA.Able to use a computer (Excel, Word, Powerpoint), and have good knowledge ofISO 9001, ISO 13485 and ISO17025 (plus skills).Good English communication skills.BenefitsGroup insuranceProvident fund 5%BonusBusOvertimeDiligence allowanceCost of living

The Service Engineer is the first contact point for various after sales issue and ensuring ultimate customer satisfaction through the flawless execution in installation and commissioning of the equipment. Client DetailsOur client is a world leader in sensor based sorting equipment and a dynamic company with an outstanding product line and customer satisfaction in the sorting industry. DescriptionInstall or modified equipment at customer facilities to ensure full functionality according to specificationsEnsure the equipment is properly maintained and in maximise performance.Establish and maintain effective working relationships with customers, internal and external associates, and management.Provides training for customers in connection with machines: both hardware and softwareYou are responsible for the preparation of spare-parts lists, reports, etcProfileUniversity degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Mechatronics, Automation or similar fieldAt least 3 years or more experienceFluent in Thai and English, Chinese will be a strong plusExcellent communication skills and the ability to deal effectively with customersTroubleshooting, and follow-up skills. excellent technical problem-solving, self-driven, pro-active and target oriented working style with a high willingness to performSuperior computer and operating system skills (Microsoft family)You have a flexible attitude with regard to travel and labourOwn a car with valid driving license with good recordJob OfferOversea job execution in Thailand, SEA and some other parts of AsiaExcellent opportunity for career growthTo apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Tanapat Apiwantanakul on +66 2012 5067

job_title: Safety Officer (Based in Lao PDR.) English Speaking
job_responsibilities: ['Job Responsibilities:General summary    SSC Safety Officer is expected to work closely with O&M teams and SSC Insurance and Safety to provide technical and administrative supports to ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations and international standards.Primary duties:Identify, Investigate and provide guidance relative to root cause of incident, accident, near miss, employee safety programs and regulatory compliance related occupational health and safety.Carry out inspection and internal audit. Make recommendation and corrective actions as well as the responsibility for implement it.To implement effective occupational health and safety training plans e.g. hazardous communication, confined space, fire fighting, emergency response plan to develop on awareness and skilsl of employees. Coordinating and ensuring that all personnel are in occupational health and safety conformanceTo ensure employee and contractor working on the site area is in compliance with policy and safety procedures.Maintain safety records and other related documents. Making changes to working practices that are safe and comply with safety regulation.Provide and control the work permit for contractor and worker to ensure that the work covered by a work permit to be executed in a safe and controlled manner.Inspect and implement an appropriate level of safety equipment and function, fire detection system, fire fighting system, personal protective equipment, emergency procedures, first-aid facilities, safety/warning signs associated with the operation, maintenance and construction activity.Create and organize the safety activities to enhance associates’ safety awareness.Communicating chemical hazards to workers who must handle the hazardous materials under the Hazard Communication Programs, written programs/labeling/MSDS etc.']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor’s Degree in Occupational Health and Safety Science or related fields.Minimum Safety officer in advanced technical level prescribed by Thai, Laos Laws.Minimum 1 years ‘s experience in safety field.Experiences a safety operations in the power plant and OHSAS 18001 would be advantage.Good command in English and computer literacyBenefits:Hardship AllowanceMedical (IPD/OPD)andDental claimsPerformance BonusTravelling AllowanceAccommodationWe offer a good remuneration and benefits package with excellent career opportunities. Interested candidates are invited to write in English with full resume, stating present and expected salaries, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below;Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.Xayaburi Power Co., Ltd587 Viriyathavorn Building, Sutthisarn Road, Dindaeng Subdistrict,Dindaeng District, Bangkok 10400 ThailandTel. :+66 (0) 2691-9720-34 Ext. 1926Website :www.xayaburi.com ']
job_description: Job Responsibilities:General summary    SSC Safety Officer is expected to work closely with O&M teams and SSC Insurance and Safety to provide technical and administrative supports to ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations and international standards.Primary duties:Identify, Investigate and provide guidance relative to root cause of incident, accident, near miss, employee safety programs and regulatory compliance related occupational health and safety.Carry out inspection and internal audit. Make recommendation and corrective actions as well as the responsibility for implement it.To implement effective occupational health and safety training plans e.g. hazardous communication, confined space, fire fighting, emergency response plan to develop on awareness and skilsl of employees. Coordinating and ensuring that all personnel are in occupational health and safety conformanceTo ensure employee and contractor working on the site area is in compliance with policy and safety procedures.Maintain safety records and other related documents. Making changes to working practices that are safe and comply with safety regulation.Provide and control the work permit for contractor and worker to ensure that the work covered by a work permit to be executed in a safe and controlled manner.Inspect and implement an appropriate level of safety equipment and function, fire detection system, fire fighting system, personal protective equipment, emergency procedures, first-aid facilities, safety/warning signs associated with the operation, maintenance and construction activity.Create and organize the safety activities to enhance associates’ safety awareness.Communicating chemical hazards to workers who must handle the hazardous materials under the Hazard Communication Programs, written programs/labeling/MSDS etc.Qualifications:Bachelor’s Degree in Occupational Health and Safety Science or related fields.Minimum Safety officer in advanced technical level prescribed by Thai, Laos Laws.Minimum 1 years ‘s experience in safety field.Experiences a safety operations in the power plant and OHSAS 18001 would be advantage.Good command in English and computer literacyBenefits:Hardship AllowanceMedical (IPD/OPD)andDental claimsPerformance BonusTravelling AllowanceAccommodationWe offer a good remuneration and benefits package with excellent career opportunities. Interested candidates are invited to write in English with full resume, stating present and expected salaries, and enclosing a recent photograph to the address below;Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.Xayaburi Power Co., Ltd587 Viriyathavorn Building, Sutthisarn Road, Dindaeng Subdistrict,Dindaeng District, Bangkok 10400 ThailandTel. :+66 (0) 2691-9720-34 Ext. 1926Website :www.xayaburi.com

job_responsibilities: ['Key Accountabilities:Wastewater treatment system(powder wastewater and process wastewater)-Monitor and control wastewater parameter to comply legal or department concerned-Monitor, control, adjust chemical feeding ratio optimization-Monitor and control machine in Wastewater Treatment Plant-Initial design and creative project of Wastewater Treatment Plant-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standard Recycle water system-Monitor and control recycle water parameter to comply department concerned-Monitor and control machine in recycle water system-Monitor and operate filtration system-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standardSanitary system (drainage, septic) and water supply system-Monitor and control septic parameter to comply legal or department concerned-Monitor and control water quality in factory-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standardCreative in cost saving, energy saving and environmental conservation']
job_qualifications: [':-Bachelor degree or higher in Environmental Engineering or related field.-Working experienced 3-5 years in wastewater treatment system (Chemical treatment system).-Certificate specialist of wastewater controller has required-Experience in implement wastewater treatment project, cost saving project, etc.-    Proficiency in computer skills, MS Office-Good command of English both written and spoken ']
job_description: Key Accountabilities:Wastewater treatment system(powder wastewater and process wastewater)-Monitor and control wastewater parameter to comply legal or department concerned-Monitor, control, adjust chemical feeding ratio optimization-Monitor and control machine in Wastewater Treatment Plant-Initial design and creative project of Wastewater Treatment Plant-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standard Recycle water system-Monitor and control recycle water parameter to comply department concerned-Monitor and control machine in recycle water system-Monitor and operate filtration system-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standardSanitary system (drainage, septic) and water supply system-Monitor and control septic parameter to comply legal or department concerned-Monitor and control water quality in factory-Solve problem and analyze when parameter over standardCreative in cost saving, energy saving and environmental conservationQualification:-Bachelor degree or higher in Environmental Engineering or related field.-Working experienced 3-5 years in wastewater treatment system (Chemical treatment system).-Certificate specialist of wastewater controller has required-Experience in implement wastewater treatment project, cost saving project, etc.-    Proficiency in computer skills, MS Office-Good command of English both written and spoken

job_title: EHS Manager (Western Manufacturing)100-150K/Safety and Environmental Manager
job_responsibilities: ['Position: EHS Manager (Western Manufacturing)100-150KBenefits: 100,000-150,000 Baht/month + Other BenefitsBased: BangkokContact Recruiter: Kusumant 086-378-4085Kusumant(@)mriww.co.thOur client is one of the global (Western) leading manufacturers in FMCG and Healthcare products. They are looking for a EHS Manager with strong experience and track record in Safety and Environment in international or global manufacturers.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for developing, aligning and execution of EHS strategy, setting department goals and ensure its attainment.Establishes organization safety and health objectives, policies and procedures in compliance with local, state, and relevant occupational safety and health setup rules and regulationsEHS internal & external Audits and Inspection, corrective & Preventive Action development and follow-up.In charge of promotion and supervision of waste treatment, energy saving, water saving and waste reduction projects.Provide consistent coaching to team members and EHS committee to develop a strong team demonstrating IR value.Liaison with local authorities regarding EHS issues, follow up newly promulgated or updated laws and standards regarding EHSManages the training of safety and health policies and practices to managers and employees. Such as on-site safety practice, fire prevention, and correct handling techniques for chemicals, toxins, equipment and materials.Coordinate the regional regulatory compliance programs, strictly follows EHS incident report procedure.Other task assigned']
job_qualifications: ['s and Experience:-Thai nationality, Male/FemaleAge 30-55 years oldBachelor degree. Major in Occupational Health & Safety or mechanical engineering.Over 5-10 years experience in EHS for international companies.Good planning, data analysis, and problem solving, and communication skillsMust be team-oriented with strong leadership and interpersonal skills.Strong English communication skills.Attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates.Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refers the positionEHS Manager (Western Manufacturing)100-150Ktokusumant (@) mriww.co.th,If you believe that you are the right one,call Kusumant "NOW"086-3784085 ']
job_description: Position: EHS Manager (Western Manufacturing)100-150KBenefits: 100,000-150,000 Baht/month + Other BenefitsBased: BangkokContact Recruiter: Kusumant 086-378-4085Kusumant(@)mriww.co.thOur client is one of the global (Western) leading manufacturers in FMCG and Healthcare products. They are looking for a EHS Manager with strong experience and track record in Safety and Environment in international or global manufacturers.ResponsibilitiesResponsible for developing, aligning and execution of EHS strategy, setting department goals and ensure its attainment.Establishes organization safety and health objectives, policies and procedures in compliance with local, state, and relevant occupational safety and health setup rules and regulationsEHS internal & external Audits and Inspection, corrective & Preventive Action development and follow-up.In charge of promotion and supervision of waste treatment, energy saving, water saving and waste reduction projects.Provide consistent coaching to team members and EHS committee to develop a strong team demonstrating IR value.Liaison with local authorities regarding EHS issues, follow up newly promulgated or updated laws and standards regarding EHSManages the training of safety and health policies and practices to managers and employees. Such as on-site safety practice, fire prevention, and correct handling techniques for chemicals, toxins, equipment and materials.Coordinate the regional regulatory compliance programs, strictly follows EHS incident report procedure.Other task assignedQualifications and Experience:-Thai nationality, Male/FemaleAge 30-55 years oldBachelor degree. Major in Occupational Health & Safety or mechanical engineering.Over 5-10 years experience in EHS for international companies.Good planning, data analysis, and problem solving, and communication skillsMust be team-oriented with strong leadership and interpersonal skills.Strong English communication skills.Attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates.Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refers the positionEHS Manager (Western Manufacturing)100-150Ktokusumant (@) mriww.co.th,If you believe that you are the right one,call Kusumant "NOW"086-3784085

job_title: HSE Auditor - ประสบการณ์ 5 ปี/ผู้ตรวจสอบสายงาน Environmental Health and Safety - ประสบการณ์ 5 ปี
job_description: SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES:Acting as the audit team leader and manage the audit team (if no Lead or Senior Auditor in team)Check daily job allocation for audit assignment detail.Review reference audit documents, i.e., Standards, client’s SOP/Procedure, etc., prior to execution of audit to ascertain completeness of information / document and complete understanding of applicable audit requirements. Represent the company with integrity, professionalism, and skills when conducting the auditPrioritize, plan, organized work efficiently to deliver first-rate audit services and end products such as audit recaps, reports and other client specific reporting tools. Conduct audit in an accurate, detailed, and timely manner, write comprehensive report of findings in compliance with Standards/SOP/client requirement and applicable references mentioned above. Inform Acting Operation Manager – Audit and / or coordinator of any problems found during audit, i.e, unable to enter facility, and/or no cooperaton from facility, prior to making any decision for further solution or completion of the auditRetain and safeguard document/information pertaining to the audit and maintain all audit findings confidentially.Prepare and submit the audit report within time frame, preferably on the next working day.Identify training needs, and where applicable, provide recommendation on trainings required for continuous work improvements and capability enhancement.Operate to the highest standards of ethics, in accordance with the SGS Statement of IntegrityKeep the confidential data of all audit informationQUALIFICATION & SKILLS:Bachelor Degree inSafety Engineer or Environmental Engineer/Science or EHS.5 years in Environmental Health and Safety.Able to prioritize client requests, plan, and adjust to different client audit requirements.Able to adapt communications to the situation.Strong planning, organizational, and time management skills.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneouslyAble to interact with all levels of management, suppliers and clientsGood at observing, analyzing, and reporting.Good in English communication, both speaking and writing.Capable of operating PC.Applies judgment and acts according to the SGS standards of ethics and integrity.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road, Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117

job_title: Safety Officer(เจ้าหน้าที่ด้านความปลอดภัย ประสบการณ์ 1 ปีขี้นไป)
job_description: หน้าที่และรายละเอียดงานตรวจสอบและเสนอแนะให้นายจ้างปฏิบัติตามกฎหมายเกี่ยวกับความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัย และสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงานวิเคราะห์งานเพื่อชี้บ่งอันตราย รวมทั้งกำหนดมาตรการป้องกันหรือขั้นตอนการทำงานอย่างปลอดภัยเสนอต่อนายจ้างประเมินความเสี่ยงด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานวิเคราะห์แผนงานโครงการ รวมทั้งข้อเสนอแนะของหน่วยงานต่างๆและเสนอแนะมาตรการความปลอดภัยในการทำงานต่อนายจ้างตรวจประเมิน การปฏิบัติงานของสถานประกอบกิจการ ให้เป็นไปตามแผนงาน โครงการหรือมาตรการความปลอดภัยในการทำงานแนะนำให้ลูกจ้างปฏิบัติตามข้อบังคับและคู่มือความปลอดภัยแนะนำ ฝึกสอน อบรมลูกจ้างเพื่อให้การปฏิบัติงานปลอดจากเหตุอันจะทำให้เกิดความไม่ปลอดภัยในการทำงานตรวจวัดและประเมินสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน หรือดำเนินการร่วมกับบุคคลหรือหน่วยงานที่ขึ้นทะเบียนกับกรมสวัสดิการและคุ้มครองแรงงานเป็นผู้รับรองหรือตรวจสอบเอกสารหลักฐานรายงานในการตรวจสอบสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงานภายในสถานประกอบกิจการเสนอแนะนายจ้างเพื่อให้มีการจัดการด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานที่เหมาะสมกับสถานประกอบกิจการ และพัฒนาให้มีประสิทธิภาพอย่างต่อเนื่องตรวจสอบหาสาเหตุ และวิเคราะห์การประสบอันตราย การเจ็บป่วย หรือการเกิดเหตุเดือดร้อนรำคาญ อันเนื่องจากการทำงาน และรายงานผล รวมทั้งเสนอแนะต่อนายจ้างเพื่อป้องกันการเกิดเหตุโดยไม่ชักช้ารวบรวมสถิติ วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล จัดทำรายงาน และข้อเสนอแนะเกี่ยวกับการประสบอันตราย การเจ็บป่วย หรือการเกิดเหตุเดือดร้อนรำคาญอันเนื่องจากการทำงานของลูกจ้างปฏิบัติงานด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานอื่นตามที่นายจ้างมอบหมายจัดทำเอกสาร Safety Audit และตารางการ Auditคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครปริญญาตรีสาขาอาชีวอนามัย หรือผ่านการสอบอบรมหลักสูตร จป.ระดับวิชาชีพประสบการณ์ 1 ปีขึ้นไปสามารถสื่อสารและประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆให้บรรลุเป้าหมายด้านความปลอดภัยอาชีวอนามัยมีความละเอียดรอบครอบในการปฏิบัติงานสูงมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี

An exciting SMT Manager (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at Electronic manufacturer based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for SMT Manager who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective process operation. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:General assists in the production line of surface mount technologies, which involve attaching electronic materials to printed circuit boardsDevelop and implement advanced processes and SMT methodologiesPerform defect and failure analyses for Surface Mount Technology (SMT)Lead improvements in process yield, quality, cycle time, inventory accuracy and deliveryInspect various machinery, tools, and materials involved in the process to make sure that they are working properly.Lead a team of SMT Machine Operators and Process TechniciansReport direct to Plant ManagerTo succeed in the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) job, you will need to have experiences on electronic industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's or Master degree in EngineeringAt least 10 years in experience in electronic manufacturingStrong knowledge in SMT processSolid background in electronic businessMust have been working in MNC company with good understanding in international operationsMust have strong people management, leadership and presentation skillsGood command in English language This electronic company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined SMT Manager with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

job_title: HSE Auditor - ประสบการณ์ 5 ปี/ผู้ตรวจสอบสายงาน Environmental Health and Safety - ประสบการณ์ 5 ปี
job_description: SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES:Acting as the audit team leader and manage the audit team (if no Lead or Senior Auditor in team)Check daily job allocation for audit assignment detail.Review reference audit documents, i.e., Standards, client’s SOP/Procedure, etc., prior to execution of audit to ascertain completeness of information / document and complete understanding of applicable audit requirements. Represent the company with integrity, professionalism, and skills when conducting the auditPrioritize, plan, organized work efficiently to deliver first-rate audit services and end products such as audit recaps, reports and other client specific reporting tools. Conduct audit in an accurate, detailed, and timely manner, write comprehensive report of findings in compliance with Standards/SOP/client requirement and applicable references mentioned above. Inform Acting Operation Manager – Audit and / or coordinator of any problems found during audit, i.e, unable to enter facility, and/or no cooperaton from facility, prior to making any decision for further solution or completion of the auditRetain and safeguard document/information pertaining to the audit and maintain all audit findings confidentially.Prepare and submit the audit report within time frame, preferably on the next working day.Identify training needs, and where applicable, provide recommendation on trainings required for continuous work improvements and capability enhancement.Operate to the highest standards of ethics, in accordance with the SGS Statement of IntegrityKeep the confidential data of all audit informationQUALIFICATION & SKILLS:Bachelor Degree inSafety Engineer or Environmental Engineer/Science or EHS.5 years in Environmental Health and Safety.Able to prioritize client requests, plan, and adjust to different client audit requirements.Able to adapt communications to the situation.Strong planning, organizational, and time management skills.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneouslyAble to interact with all levels of management, suppliers and clientsGood at observing, analyzing, and reporting.Good in English communication, both speaking and writing.Capable of operating PC.Applies judgment and acts according to the SGS standards of ethics and integrity.Human Resources DepartmentSGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee Road, Chongnonsee YannawaBangkok 10120 ThailandTel : +66 (0)2 678 18 13 Ext 1117

The PostKing’s College International School Bangkok is growing quickly in preparation for an August 2020 opening for children aged 2-11. We are now looking for a lifeguard to work with the school community. We believe in treating each other with kindness and good manners at all times. Due to the mixed nature of our community, the lifeguard will be able to communicate in Thai and English to a good standard, be very well organised and have a passion for customer service.Overall ResponsibilitiesThe lifeguard is responsible for supporting the physical safety of all children and adults during use of the school’s swimming pools. The lifeguard will assist with swimming lessons and swimming activities.Duties and ResponsibilitiesLifeguard for PE swimming lessons, as scheduled by the PE teacher.Assist with the maintenance, cleaning, and setup of both pool facilities.Assist the PE teacher with programme operations when directed (eg, supplies, maintenance, renovations).Maintain current first aid and water rescue credentials (and be prepared to assist in first aid/water rescue emergencies).Assist in the preparation of pools for aquatics practices, including the preparation of lane ropes, flags, first aid kits, lightning detectors and swim equipment.Conduct weekly safety checks inside and around the pools and reporting any issues to the PE teacher.Keep PE offices clean and free from excess equipment.Assist in preparing for PE events when directed by the PE teacher.Perform other relevant duties of a similar type and at a similar level.Attend school meetings.Attend school seminars, retreats, activities and training.Perform any other duties or responsibilities as assigned by the supervisor.The successful candidates will:Be kind, well mannered and wise as a role model for our students.Be passionate about helping us replicate the success of King’s College School, Wimbledon in Bangkok by being committed to developing the whole child.Have 2 or more years of experience in similar roles.Be able to obtain a clear criminal record from the Royal Thai Police.Supply appropriate references from current and previous employers (referees will be contacted by the recruitment team via telephone).Have relevant lifeguarding and water safety training.The following would also be desirable:Previous experience in an international school.Bachelor Degree in Physical Education.All staff are expected, in the spirit of teamwork and for the welfare of the school, to perform any other related tasks, within reason, for the department and from time to time support other departments as requested by his/her immediate supervisor.Please noteKing’s College International School Bangkok is fully committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and expects all staff to share this commitment. Any offer of employment will be subject to the receipt of a criminal records check, suitably translated, satisfactory references, and medical clearance.

job_title: Safety Officer(เจ้าหน้าที่ด้านความปลอดภัย ประสบการณ์ 1 ปีขี้นไป)
job_description: หน้าที่และรายละเอียดงานตรวจสอบและเสนอแนะให้นายจ้างปฏิบัติตามกฎหมายเกี่ยวกับความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัย และสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงานวิเคราะห์งานเพื่อชี้บ่งอันตราย รวมทั้งกำหนดมาตรการป้องกันหรือขั้นตอนการทำงานอย่างปลอดภัยเสนอต่อนายจ้างประเมินความเสี่ยงด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานวิเคราะห์แผนงานโครงการ รวมทั้งข้อเสนอแนะของหน่วยงานต่างๆและเสนอแนะมาตรการความปลอดภัยในการทำงานต่อนายจ้างตรวจประเมิน การปฏิบัติงานของสถานประกอบกิจการ ให้เป็นไปตามแผนงาน โครงการหรือมาตรการความปลอดภัยในการทำงานแนะนำให้ลูกจ้างปฏิบัติตามข้อบังคับและคู่มือความปลอดภัยแนะนำ ฝึกสอน อบรมลูกจ้างเพื่อให้การปฏิบัติงานปลอดจากเหตุอันจะทำให้เกิดความไม่ปลอดภัยในการทำงานตรวจวัดและประเมินสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงาน หรือดำเนินการร่วมกับบุคคลหรือหน่วยงานที่ขึ้นทะเบียนกับกรมสวัสดิการและคุ้มครองแรงงานเป็นผู้รับรองหรือตรวจสอบเอกสารหลักฐานรายงานในการตรวจสอบสภาพแวดล้อมในการทำงานภายในสถานประกอบกิจการเสนอแนะนายจ้างเพื่อให้มีการจัดการด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานที่เหมาะสมกับสถานประกอบกิจการ และพัฒนาให้มีประสิทธิภาพอย่างต่อเนื่องตรวจสอบหาสาเหตุ และวิเคราะห์การประสบอันตราย การเจ็บป่วย หรือการเกิดเหตุเดือดร้อนรำคาญ อันเนื่องจากการทำงาน และรายงานผล รวมทั้งเสนอแนะต่อนายจ้างเพื่อป้องกันการเกิดเหตุโดยไม่ชักช้ารวบรวมสถิติ วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล จัดทำรายงาน และข้อเสนอแนะเกี่ยวกับการประสบอันตราย การเจ็บป่วย หรือการเกิดเหตุเดือดร้อนรำคาญอันเนื่องจากการทำงานของลูกจ้างปฏิบัติงานด้านความปลอดภัยในการทำงานอื่นตามที่นายจ้างมอบหมายจัดทำเอกสาร Safety Audit และตารางการ Auditคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครปริญญาตรีสาขาอาชีวอนามัย หรือผ่านการสอบอบรมหลักสูตร จป.ระดับวิชาชีพประสบการณ์ 1 ปีขึ้นไปสามารถสื่อสารและประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่างๆให้บรรลุเป้าหมายด้านความปลอดภัยอาชีวอนามัยมีความละเอียดรอบครอบในการปฏิบัติงานสูงมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี

ORGANIZATIONAL STRUCTURE & REPORTINGThe Safety Officer reports directly to the Plant manager.THE POSITIONThe main responsibility is tolead safety management process to make sure that all employee will work under safety condition.And lead to implement safety system according to corporate policy.Specific responsibilities are the following:Take care for all safety report for both submission to government as regulation require and into Sonoco system via INTELEX as well.Lead to safety activity such safety Gemba walk, STOP, Safety week, Safety meeting in regular basis.To inspect and give recommendations to the employer to comply with the law on occupational safety, health, and environment. To assess the risks in the area of occupational safety.Coordinate with all relate department in order to drive the safety objective and follow up the safety issue as well.To inspect and assess the operation of the workplace to comply with the work plan and project, or occupational safety measures.To give advice to the employees to follow the regulation and guidance as prescribed in safety manualTo examine and appraise the working conditions, or to work jointly with a person or an organization registered with the Department of Labor Protection and Welfare for certification, or to examine evidences, documents, and report of the inspection of working conditions in the workplace.To give recommendations to the employer on the appropriate management of occupational safety in the workplace, and develop it for ongoing efficiencyTo analyze and investigate the causes of accidents, illness or annoyance resulting from working of the employees, and make a report of the investigation, together with suggesting resolution, promptly to the employer. To compile statistical data, analyze, make a report and to give recommendations on accident, illness or annoyance caused by working of the employees.Developing and conducting comprehensive safety programs, and in complying with Governmental and Corporate safety and industrial safety rules and regulations.Issues bulletins, notices, and routine reports as appropriate to facilitate the communication aspects of all division safety programs. Acts as a clearing house for best demonstrated practices.Assist in the HR & GA department all jobs related to the position.At least 1-5 years in Safety officer.Excellent communicator able to get on with individuals at different levels in the organization;International orientation and multicultural understanding.Excellent organizational skills and Team player.Good communication in English and presentation skills and able to communicate at all levels.Benefit Package:Transportation Support (Chonburi) BONUSMeal AllowanceFuneral SubventionsDiligence AllowanceContributions (for childbirth)Provident fund.Group Insurance.Interested person please send resume with recent photo and mention expected salary via email or letter to HR Department.Sonoco(Thailand)Limited. 68/13 Moo.5 Mabphai Ban Bueng Chonburi 20170Tel:0-38-444891 Fax: 0-38-444909MB:098-2736876

Salary: 50,000 - 70,000 THBIndustry: Manufacturing(Glass)Location: Phim Pha, Bang Pakong (Chachoengsao)Work Type: Mon-Fri 8:30－18:00Job descriptions:Manage HSE activities to ensure compliance with external HSE regulations, standards, internal environmental policies and management systems Improving the occupational health and safety management systemMonitor risk of accident and environment in factory and analysis problem of accident and environment Ensure that manufacturing is compliant with health, safety and environmental regulationsOther related tasks as assignedGeneral qualifications:Male or Female, Thai nationality, age between 38-42Bachelor's Degree in any related fieldWork experience in Safety and environmentalGood command of English (business level)Work experience in settle safety and environmental system for manufacturingWork experience in law for manufacturing and environmentalWork experience in GA is an advantageOHSAS 18001 is an advantageBenefit package:BonusSalary adjustmentHealth insuranceLife insurance / Accident insuranceSpecial leaveSpecial case moneyAnnual health checkAnnual partyProvident fund*If you would like to know more detail, Please feel free to contact us!Contact (ติดต่อ)Time: 8.30 am - 5.30 pmOffice Number: 02 - 2539800Website:http://www.reeracoen.co.thInstagram:reeracoenthailandFacebook:Reeracoen Recruitment

Location: Bangplee, SamutprakarnEssential Responsibility:Audit and Monitoring to ensure that all actions onSafety, Occupational Health and Environment Health plan will completed. Monitor all regulation concerning Occupational Safety, Healthand EnvironmentDaily&Monthly report on progress ofSafety, Occupational Health and Environment activities at site to be report along with concerns/risks identified.Create activities, advise and train staff to prevent them from unsafe working condition and actCoordinate all safety activity relating to the jobsRequirement:At least Bachelor’s degree in Occupational Health and Safety or related fields with professional safety officer certificateAt least 1-3 years of Safety, Occupational Health and Environment experience with hands-on exposure to manufacturing companyGood Knowledge of general accounting principles, regulatory standards and compliance requirementsProcess good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work well in a teamProficient in English (Written and spoken)Proficient in MS Office applicationsGood knowledge of relevant Safety, Occupational Health and Environment principles.

ResponsibilitiesResponsible for overall tooling inventory, getting tooling ready for jobs, keeping inventory of the kits and uploading data into the tooling management.Working with other coordinators or worker of the facility to maintain and testing the tools.Maintaining status of tooling calibration and work with day by day with local calibration vendors sending the tools for calibration and repairs.Responsible for the setup of shipping and coordinate with Tooling Vendor Coordinator the delivery and collection of the tool from the site, the timing and the schedule of delivery.Inspect tools for integrity and composition also verify the part list according to the template maintain consumables stock.Follow up with the vendor regarding the shipment of the tools and work with the Sourcing Team to establish and negotiate the service contract terms and conditions.Create the procurement request in the procurement system, work with the Sourcing team to select the adequate supplier's and coordinate the delivery of the good to the tool center.Follow and suggest improvement processes.Cooperate with production managers and engineering Team to execute on day to day activities or coordinate the organization of the training at the Tool Facility .Report of damaged, missing, and unserviceable tools especially after receiving tools from sites on from the training activity.

job_title: เจ้าหน้าที่อาวุโสความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัยและสิ่งแวดล้อม/เจ้าหน้าที่อาวุโสความปลอดภัย อาชีวอนามัยและสิ่งแวดล้อม
job_description: ความรับผิดชอบหลัก1. ดูแลและจัดการงานด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม กฎหมายและความปลอดภัยของโรงงานเครือเบทาโกร2. ประสานงานโครงการด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม งานวิจัยและพัฒนาด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม3. ผลักดันให้เกิดการดำเนินงานด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม กฎหมายและความปลอดภัย ตามเป้าหมายและนโยบายของเครือเบทาโกร4. บริหารจัดการฐานข้อมูลด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม โดยภาพรวมของเครือเบทาโกรกิจกรรมหลัก1. ประสานงาน ติดตามและรวบรวมข้อมูลด้านสิ่งแวดล้อมของเครือเบทาโกร2. วิเคราะห์ฐานข้อมูลและค้นหาแนวทางในการปรับปรุงงานด้านสิ่งแวดล้อมและความปลอดภัย3. เข้าตรวจติดตามงานด้านสิ่งแวดล้อมและความปลอดภัย (Internal Audit) ในแต่ละSite งาน4. ประสานงานโครงการด้านสิ่งแวดล้อม เพื่อปรับปรุงงาน5. ประเมินสภาพปัญหางานด้านสิ่งแวดล้อมของเครือเบทาโกรและค้นหาแนวทางการแก้ไขปรับปรุง6.กำหนดมาตรการป้องกัน ประเมินความเสี่ยงหรือขั้นตอนการทำงานอย่างปลอดภัยการศึกษาวุฒิการศึกษา : ปริญญาตรี / ปริญญาโทสาขาวิชา : วิศวกรรมสิ่งแวดล้อม/วิทยาศาสตร์สิ่งแวดล้อม วิทยาศาตร์ สาขาอนามัยสิ่งแวดล้อมอาชีวอนามัยและความปลอดภัยประสบการณ์ : 3 - 7 ปี ทางด้าน การบริหารจัดการสิ่งแวดล้อมของโรงงาน***มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่รถยนต์และมีความคล่องตัวในการเดินทางไปโรงงานต่างจังหวัด

รายละเอียดงานพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ใหม่ๆที่เกี่ยวข้องกับบรรจุภัณฑ์ชนิดอ่อน งานพิมพ์กราเวียร์ (งานสี งานพิมพ์ และงานกาว) โดยใช้ความรู้ด้านเคมี และ/หรือเทคโนโลยีการพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์ปรับปรุงผลิตภัณฑ์ด้านงานพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์กำหนดมาตรฐานและคุณภาพของผลิตภัณฑ์ติดต่อ Supplier ทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศให้ความรู้และความเข้าใจเกี่ยวเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ในเชิงเทคนิคแก่ผู้ตรวจสอบคุณภาพภายนอกทั้งชาวไทยและชาวต่างประเทศบริหารทีมวิจัยและพัฒนาของบริษัทคุณสมบัติสัญชาติไทยเท่านั้นปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิทยาศาสตร์เคมี วิศวกรรมเคมี เทคโนโลยีการพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์ด้านงานวิจัยและพัฒนาบรรจุภัณฑ์ชนิดอ่อน (Flexible Packaging) อย่างน้อย 5 ปี และผ่านงานในระดับหัวหน้างานอย่างน้อย 2 ปีมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับหลักเกณฑ์และวิธีการที่ดีในการผลิต (GMP: Good Manufacturing Practice) และระบบ ISO 9001พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับมาตรฐานความปลอดภัยของสมาคมผู้ประกอบธุรกิจค้าปลีกแห่งสหราชอาณาจักร (BRC: The British Retail Consortium)ชอบศึกษาหาความรู้และเทคโนโลยีสมัยใหม่ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับงานพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์มีภาวะผู้นำ สามารถบริหารทีมได้สื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ในระดับดี (TOEIC >= 650)สามารถทำงานได้ในวันเสาร์ เดือนละ 1 เสาร์

job_title: Safety Officer (25K - 35K) (SDG-53038) /เจ้าหน้าที่ควบคุมความปลอดภัย
job_description: <Job Responsibilities>Monitoring construction of telecommunication infrastructure, wireless system processes/Ensuring safety regulations at all timesProviding technical advice and solving problem on sitesCoordinated with supervisor and all team that working on siteAble to work on Saturday and Sunday as company required<Necessary Skill / Experience >Thai nationality , Male/Female, age 24-27 years oldBachelor's Degree in occupation health and safety or any related fieldsHave experience or knowledge in construction fields at least 2-3 yearsSafety officer license is a mustGood command of EnglishHaving knowledge in construction Law and wireless system, telecommunication infrastructure<Preferable Skill / Experience>NoneLanguages skillsEnglish:Conversational LevelJapanese:NoneWorkplace Area:Chengwattana, BangkokWorking Hour:8:30-17:30(Monday-Friday (Sat-Sun as company required))About theBenefitsSalary:25,000–35,000THBAbout the companyProducts: System integrationBusiness Type: General / IT Services;Communication ServicesHOW TO APPLY,*** Please submit your resume with recent photo, yourcurrent & expected salary, and reference:Safety Officer (25K - 35K) (SDG-53038)*** Any query regarding this Job or application method, please call Tel. 02-021-0333RGF HR Agent Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.（株式会社リクルートホールディングスタイ法人）689 BHIRAJ TOWER at EmQuartier, 23rd Floor, Room No. 2304-2306Sukhumvit Road, North Klongton Sub-District, Vadhana District, Bangkok 1011Tel: 02-021-0333Website : www.rgf-hragent.asia/en/thailand

JOB CONTEXTThe Engineer is responsible for the end to end project management and across the manufacturing operation, managing projects from concept to commissioning within a varied manufacturing environment such as process, packing or facilities and utilities.Working conditionsOccasional travelling abroad required for meetings with and visits to other plants, suppliers, manufacturers and Head QuartersFlexible attitude to changing conditions.GOAL AND KEY ACCOUNTABILITIESThe Engineer supports the delivery of the key plant results (Compelling Business Need - CBN), such as zero safety accidents, zero quality (losses), cost savings, efficiency improvement, 100% Customer Service Level and 100% engagement using the Manufacturing Operating System - MOS program as an enabler. The Project Engineer does this through agile and flawless project management and execution of varied projects across the manufacturing operation, through any of the phases from concept to commissioning. High personal development of some Leadership CapabilitiesRESPONSIBILITIES/KEY ACTIVITIESSafety Health and Environment:Drives Safety Health and Environment culture through role modelling behaviors. Responsible for Safety Health and Environment requirements and legislation implementation and ensures compliance to legal and corporate standards & policies in own projects and installations as an example LOTOTO – Lock Out Tag Out Test Out, permit to work, hazard work permits, behavioral observation safety, auditing and process isolations.Responsible to ensure that ergonomics and SHE – Safety, Health & Environment risks are mitigated or eliminated in own projectsManaging contractors in the work area, preparing permits and reviewing risk assessments and method statements.Quality:Drives Quality culture through role modelling behaviors. Responsible for Quality requirements and legislation implementation and ensure compliance to legal and corporate standards & policies in own projects Ensures project designs and execution includes Good Manufacturing Processes including Sanitary Design rules and new Manufacturing Operating System - MOS StandardsDelivery & Cost:Project Planning:Responsible for pre-engineering scoping, costing and capital expenditure request document preparation using the appropriate standards, processes and procedures aligned with IM – Initiative Management pillar Communication:Giving regular stakeholder updates on project progress.Engaging and communicating with all relevant associates through the whole lifecycle of the project to ensure that the project deliverables meets all practical requirements (maintenance, operation, training, etc) Project Management & Execution: Producing tender documents for suppliers to ensure competitive bidding on project works and working with central procurement to get contracts in place for orders.Preparing and issuing relevant documentation such as drawings, cable schedules, commissioning documents, equipment schedules, FAT – Factory Acceptance Check, SAT – Systems Acceptance Test, S&H – Safety and Health checklists, risk assessments. Working with the software engineers to develop a URS – User Request Specification for the process installation and review FDS – Functional Development Specification.Management of orders through the use of SAP, from raising PO’s – Purchase Orders, issuing to suppliers, receipting and checking invoice discrepancies.Managing cost versus budget using the appropriate standards to report actual, commitment, and remaining budget spend on a monthly basis.Project Close-Out: Commission the installation with the project team and suppliers and ensure full snag tracking and close out through commissioning, qualification and verification.Ensure relevant handover documentation is in place such as OEM – Original Equipment Manufacturers manuals, training documents and risk assessments.Create appropriate training material with the use of the SME - Subject Matter Experts, Training Coordinators and the Organizational pillarEducationUniversity Degree (Bachelor) or higher in Engineering or another related field.Languages: Local - Fluent; English - IntermediateExperienceProven 5 years experience of delivering significant capex investment projects.Strong engineering (multi skilled or mechanical bias) background ideally within a process manufacturing environment.Experience of hands on commissioning.Strong project and stakeholder managements skills with experience of navigating complex projects.Experience of managing tender processes and delivering against financial budgets.Experience and or understand of project management techniques.CompetencyLeadership CapabilitiesDriving A Growth MindsetDelivering Above & BeyondDevelops Self & OthersBuilds Winning PartnershipsCreates Clarity & DisciplineInspires a Culture of Pride & Performance

A global leading electronic device organisation is seeking for Operation Director (x1 vacancy) based at their site in Chonburi to lead team and support a large, complex business unit. About the Operation Director Role:This is a great opportunity for the Operation Director to be responsible for ensuring smooth, efficient and safe running of plant by overseeing all daily operations and developing future strategy to reach profitable production performance. The salary range for this role is THB 150k - 180k per month with allowances + bonuses.This is a great opportunity for an outstanding Operation Director to play a vital role to lead, plan, and control all related operation activities, directly reporting to the CEO.Key Responsibilities:Manage overall operations and is responsible for the effective and successful management of labour, productivity, quality control and safety measures as established and set for the operation departmentReviews production and operating reports and resolves operation, manufacturing and maintenance problems to ensure minimum costs and deliver 100% On Time shipmentPlan and monitor the day-to-day running of business to ensure smooth progressSupervise staff from different departments and provide constructive feedbackContribute operations information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; prepare and complete action plans; implement production, productivity, quality and resolve problemAn outstanding and progressive Operation Director is required for this rewarding role.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher-level qualification in engineering with MBA is a plusAt least 15 years' experience in management level in manufacturing environment from various operations functions in automotive, aerospace, electronic or medical equipment industries. Rely on extensive experience and judgement to plan and accomplish goalsGood command of English language in reading, written and oral communicationProven experience in developing and executing strategic plans as well as demonstrate experience in tactical executionThis company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise.If you are a driven and determined Operation Director with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

job_responsibilities: ['Job Description:Acts as an influential advisor to line management by building and fostering a deep understanding of the theoretical concepts, industry standards and best practices in one or more HSE&S areas.Extends HSE&S knowledge through personal participation in AkzoNobel HSE&S network platforms or in the delivery of the HSE&S Common Platform, as well as through personal functional development.Contributes, together with and in support of line management, to a culture in which HSE&S is at the core of all activities.Spends time engaging with employees and acts as a role model for ensuring compliance with and commitment to the AkzoNobel HSE&S Policy, Directives, Rules & Procedures, including its risk tolerance criteria.Contributes to the delivery of the HSE&S strategy, HSE&S Policy, Directives, Rules & Procedures and HSE&S Common Platform for the location or entity, in order to ensure alignment of objectives and performance of the site.Familiar and complies with all the applicable corporate as well as location policies/procedures with regard to personal conduct, HSE&S and Product Safety & Regulatory Affairs (PSRA) standards.']
